name: VPCGatewayAttachment
shortDesc: Attaches a gateway to a VPC.

properties.name: InternetGatewayId
properties.desc: The ID of the Internet gateway.

properties.name: VpcId
properties.desc: The ID of the VPC to associate with this gateway.

properties.name: VpnGatewayId
properties.desc: The ID of the virtual private network (VPN) gateway to attach to the VPC.
